#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	char str[100];
	int t,c,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    cin>>str;
	    i=0;
	    c=0;
	    while(str[i]!='\0')
	    {
	        if(str[i]=='B')
	            c=c+2;
	        else if(str[i]=='A' || str[i]=='D' || str[i]=='O' || str[i]=='P' || str[i]=='Q' || str[i]=='R')
	            c=c+1;
	       ++i;
	    }
	    cout<<c<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
